original_title: Billy's Bootcamp Elite: Mission Spot Training - Lower Body
overview: Here's the key to long, lean perfectly sculpted legs - Billy Blanks' Mission Spot Training: Lower Body workout from Billy's Bootcamp Elite series! Let popular fitness expert Billy Blanks and his team lead you in specifically targeting your quads, glutes, and even your abs.
tagline: Sculpt legs that will make heads turn
title: Billy's Bootcamp Elite: Mission Spot Training - Lower Body
